title: Aseefa Bhutto attends Global Women’s Forum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 27 (APP):Member of National Assembly Aseefa Bhutto Zardari has attended the Global Women’s Forum, being held in Dubai.
The forum was organized by Dubai Women’s Establishment, said a news release issued by the party secretariat here on Wednesday.
The inaugural session of the forum was attended by the Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE HH Sheikh Mohammed, First Lady of Turkiye Emine Erdogan, and louise Araneta Marcos, First Lady of the Philippines.
The event attracted approximately 6,000 dignitaries and advocates for women’s empowerment and gender balance.
Aseefa Bhutto also participated in the panel discussion, highlighting the positive contributions of women in Pakistan.
On the sideline of the forum, Aseefa Bhutto held a bilateral meeting with  Latifa MRM, Chairperson of Dubai Culture & Arts Authority, Member of the Dubai Council and Member of the Executive Council of Dubai.
During the two-day forum, Aseefa Bhutto Zardari also had interaction with Mona G. AlMarri Chairperson of the Board & Managing Director Dubai Women Establishment.
